comment: She is NOT helpful at ALL! Emails were not even worth the effort. I sent emails to classmates for clarity because they responded faster and had a better answer. Her test and quizzes are easy as pie. Strictly from the book. But her communication was not good for an online student.

DO NOT TAKE HER! I just started the spring semester and it's awful! My GPA is going to be ruined because of this. All her tests are multiple choice except the exam. She doesn't even tell you what you got wrong but you will fail the exam. Her multiple choice quizzes are trick questions. You can read the book and still pick the wrong anaswer.

Took her over summer.Shes Hilarious!!Makes class entertaining and fun.Class did not need the book, because notes were posted on Georgia View.She really wants students to understand the Criminal Justice system,and will go over what ever need until students fully understand.Great teacher,fun class.Easy A!
she is really smart and knows her stuff. This prof is experienced. Take her she is really good. She explains everything and tells u all the info for the test...

She is amazing. She really knows her stuff and explains everything briefly. She is a intelligent professor and is very kind. If you are in her class, you should be serious she does not like stupid questions or comments. She is very professional. Easy grade if you study a bit.

this teacher is awful. every class was a racial debate. very rude to students. don't even think about getting an answer to a question. she reads straight from powerpoints and doesn't even know what is on them til that class. extremely unprepared. if you do take her then DO NOT bash police or use bad words in term paper. she says you can.

KSU is very lucky to have such an incredible professor. Professor Smith sincerely cares about all of her students. Make sure you attend all classes even though attendance is not counted in the grade, but needed to learn. Study whatever she repeats several times in class, and you'll do fine on the exams.

Do not take this class! She has no idea what she's talking about, she reads directly from the power points that came with the book for teachers. She is not helpful, does not like to help the students out.  The test are multiple choice but there are 3 to 5 essay questions that she does not go over. I would tell anyone not to take this class with her

This lady is all over the place.  She is very unclear on directions but expects us to know everything she is talking about.  She does not answer questions directly and makes students feel stupid when asking questions.  Avoid taking her! I thought this class would be an easy A but I was highly mistaken.

This professor is thorough and articulates the work very good.  This professor knows her stuff.  She has been in the field and brings a lot of knowledge to the classroom.  The test she gave our class was multiple choice and kind of easy.  Good class.
